Name: Hiber Scarf
LongDescription: Absorbs damage from Fighting-type moves to restore HP. Keep it in the Treasure Bag to give its benefit to all of these team members: Teddiursa and Ursaring.  You can get a Hiber Scarf at the Croagunk Swap Shop by swapping: an Ursa-Claw, an Ursa-Fang, and a Calming Rock. That's the easy way!  An item with a ☆☆☆-rarity rating is very hard to get. It's beyond valuable!
